attributes.action: Make vegan and vegetarian products the same price as the original product.
attributes.background: I am an 11 year old vegan, I'm new to veganism and we are already worrying about prices. For example, vegan cheese is £2.70 per 200g and original cheese is £2.50 per 500g.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of manufacturers and retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
